__e: That... woman just told us Sidney has a partner, and she damn sure knows who it is.
And last night? Sidney said you crawled through her window last night too.
- Yeah, but if I'm not mistaken... you said in your book that Sidney got it wrong once before.
I'm not wise and handsome like Sidney and I'm not strong and forthright like you.
What Sidney needs, it is the same thing.
We're in Sydney. You've been in here the whole time.
